item.description:
In finalizing our plans for the rest of the year we decided to spend only one more meeting on the Federalist Papers. Any suggestions, highlights, proposals for worth to read list amongst the remaining papers (the second half of the book) are very welcome. There is no assigned text in a strict sense.

The following meeting (a single one) we will spend on The Anti-Federalist Papers (http://www.constituti... ). Again any pointers to select important ones are welcome. Feel free to suggest, bring up some of these papers for the coming meeting on The Federalist Papers.
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask for the philosophy group from the staff.
item.name: Federalist Papers III (final)
